text: Classification is an evaluation of compliance of vesselâ€™s technical condition as well as its mechanisms, hull, and equipment with the rules of the Mediterranean Shipping Register and with the normative and technical documents to determine the possibility of assignment, renewal, reassignment, retainment, and confirmation of the Register class according to their purpose and to ensure the protection of human life at sea, the safe and reliable transport of passengers and cargo, and the prevention of pollution environment.
